data.event: The lands around the town was first settled by Europeans in 1840.
Clifton Post Office opened on 20 April 1869 (known as King's Creek for a short period in 1869).

event.title: known as King's Creek for a short period in 1869

data.event: Clifton Post Office opened on 20 April 1869 (known as King's Creek for a short period in 1869).
On 28 January 1964 Clifton Secondary Department commenced classes.

event.title: 1966, a new high school was declared

data.event: In 1966, a new high school was declared.
